entities.name: death eater
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people who follow Lord Voldemort and include Lucius Malfoy.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is the one who tortured Harry Potter in a dark graveyard.

relationships.description: Lucius Malfoy is a member of the Death Eaters.
Harry Potter was tortured by Lord Voldemort in a dark graveyard.
